content: this is a super fun washcloth/dishcloth that i made in one day easy to make and fun to knit it is also handy for washing dishes or to use in the bath or shower enjoy the free pattern *yarn * i used lily spinrite sugar n cream ombres in color fleur de lavande but feel free to use any cotton worsted weight yarn you would like the washcloth used about 55-70 yards or less *needles * size 5 us 3 75 mm circular or straight knitting needles but use any needles that fits the yarn you are using for the project or that meets gauge *gauge * 4 sts and 5 ½ row over 1 inch in stockinette stitch knit flat note gauge is not very important unless you would like your washcloth/dishcloth to be the exact same size as mine
